OICR资金五个创新的癌症药物发现项目安大略省癌症研究所（OICR）宣布支持五个安大略省研究团队，致力于开发下一代的药物，这些药物更有效地杀死肿瘤，造成更少的副作用并降低癌症会恢复的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/oicr-funds-funds-five-innovative-cancer-drug-discovery-projects.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/oicr-funds-funds-five-innovative-cancer-drug-discovery-projects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8C535D21-51-47DB-A285-285-210EE6A59238 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 14:16:57 -0400 OICR funds five innovative cancer drug discovery projects
临床试验证明了针对儿童致命脑肿瘤的靶向治疗方法的安全性据报道，一项I期临床试验表明，在称为弥漫性内在蓬托胶质瘤（DIPG）的儿童中治疗致命脑肿瘤的有针对性方法是安全的，据报道，据报道，Weill Cornell Medicine和纪念Sloan Kettering癌症中心的研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/clinical-clinical-trial-dymstrates-safety-safety-safety-of-targeted-warteatment-warterment-parkacher-for-for--------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/clinical-clinical-trial-dymstrates-safety-safety-safety-of-targeted-warteatment-warteatment-warterment-for-for-for-deadly-brain-brain-teadly-brain-in-rumor-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89Edfc0d-8d09-4bea-a710-089e80b844ab7 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 14:09:25 -0400 Clinical trial demonstrates safety of targeted treatment approach for deadly brain tumor in children
美国医师学院宣布$ 260,000的赠款，以促进公平的肥胖症护理今天，美国医师学院（ACP）宣布，已授予总共26万美元的赠款，以支持应对肥胖症护理股权挑战的地区计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/american-college-of-physicians-physicians-physicians-2426000000-in-in-in-in-in-in-Grants-to-Advance-advance-aidvance-equietable-equietable-obesity-obesity-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/american-college-of-physicians-physicians-physicians-2426000000-in-in-in-in-in-in-Grants-to-Advance-Advance-aidvance-equietable-equietable-equietable-equietabil-obesity-care-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=070d6713-adf3-4737-865b-e275222f8c561 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 13:56:42 -0400 American College of Physicians announces $260,000 in grants to advance equitable obesity care
研究将神经素缺乏症与PCOS的排卵功能障碍联系起来多囊卵巢综合征（PCOS）代表了生殖年龄妇女的重要健康问题，表现为一种复杂的内分泌疾病，具有不同的临床表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-links-neurotensin-deficity-to-ovulatory-dysfunctory-dysfunction-in-pcos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-links-neurotensin-decificity-to-ovulatory-dysfuntory-dysfunction-in-pcos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b30cb81-b3f7-4cc0-a043-9cea68f92938 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 13:06:00 -0400 Study links neurotensin deficiency to ovulatory dysfunction in PCOS
Bach2蛋白被确定为特应性皮炎的关键调节剂特应性皮炎是一种过敏，影响了日本人群的大约10％，症状与社会压力密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/bach2-protein-istendified-side-s-key-negulator-in-apopic-dermatitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/bach2-protein-istendified-side--sy-key-gregulator-in-Atopic-dermatitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B560CD01-A195-4A69-AEC0-AEC0-A8BBC593B717 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 12:56:00 -0400 Bach2 protein identified as key regulator in atopic dermatitis
新的基于CT的分数有助于预测重复鼻窦手术的需求新的基于CT的风险评分促进了由于慢性鼻孔炎而导致的经过修订内窥镜鼻窦手术风险的患者的鉴定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-ct基于score-helps-helps-predict-need-for-repeat-repeat-sinus-surogery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-ct基于score-helps-helps-predict-need-for-repeat-repeat-sinus-surogery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=977d7331-d93c-45bf-80a3-70bb45fb999ac Thu, 03 Apr 2025 12:52:45 -0400 New CT-based score helps predict need for repeat sinus surgery
瞄准大脑外的关键蛋白质可以帮助管理帕金森与心脏有关的心脏问题根据萨里大学的新研究，帕金森的不仅会影响运动和大脑 - 也可能影响心脏。萨里兽医学院的科学家表明，针对大脑以外的关键蛋白质的靶向可以帮助解决帕金森氏症与心脏问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/targeting-a-key-protein-inside-of-the-brain-could-help-manage-manage-parkinsons与parkinsons相关的heart-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/targeting-a-key-protein-utside-of-the-brain-could-help-manage-manage-parkinsons lass cessons-heart-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62a6cfdd-4DDB-4684-90B7-E13A7DD365BB Thu, 03 Apr 2025 12:39:56 -0400 Targeting a key protein outside of the brain could help manage Parkinson's-related heart issues
突破性研究确定了小肽用于牛皮癣治疗伯明翰的科学家表明，当局部应用于润肤霜霜时，只有三个氨基酸的序列可能会降低牛皮癣的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/breakthrough-research-indistifies-small-peptide-for-psoriasis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/breakthrough-research-indistifies-small-peptide-for-psoriasis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e9cc0c8-1b1f-4d24-9293-5517c3c9c9c94e Thu, 03 Apr 2025 12:22:19 -0400 Breakthrough research identifies small peptide for psoriasis treatment
罗格斯遗传学家发现了对多囊性肾脏疾病进展的新见解对于多囊性肾脏疾病（PKD）的患者来说，一种常见的遗传疾病，用囊肿，透析和移植的浪费器官破坏了浪费器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/rutgers-geneticists--uncover-fresh-intoights-into-pologession-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/rutgers-geneticists--uncover-fresh-ingights-into-pologession-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c0f90E6-28B9-4F3E-824B-90E5702FBA10 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 10:05:27 -0400 Rutgers geneticists uncover fresh insights into progression of polycystic kidney disease
肠道细菌可能会降低普通药物的有效性匹兹堡大学和耶鲁大学研究人员今天发表的一项新研究表明，常见的肠道细菌如何可以代谢某些靶向称为GPCR的细胞受体的口服药物，从而使这些重要药物的有效性降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/gut-bacteria-may-reduce-the-feltections-of-common-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/gut-bacteria-may-reduce-the-feltectimens-the-feltections-of-common-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c97d55f29-e3f1-40ae-94ee-94ec-dc1286e82104 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 09:11:07 -0400 Gut bacteria may reduce the effectiveness of common medications
